title: The Raven
description: My whole life I've always known that I was different.They say foster kids comes with heavy baggage.I arrived with terrifying dreams.I lived a nonchalant life, and made sure I enjoyed myself.Got into trouble with my friends.I have never been good at making good decisions.My adoptive parents sent me to a boarding school for troubled teens, they thought I needed help.But the school was not as it seemed.The Vale was a school for supernaturalAnd me, a human.How did I fit in?I knew something wasn't right the moment I stepped into the school.Turns out, Monsters were real.Demons were real.I was real.My name is Camille Raven Stark.And my life changed.It just got more interesting, intertwined with horrors, secrets and the supernatural.Ravens are often associated with loss and ill omen.Flock of Ravens are called Unkindness.I'm way worse.
author: Bertha Raw
